a condom) as well. There is

â€¢ The cap or diaphragm. 
These can be used six 
weeks after you give birth. 
If you had a cap before, 
it probably will not be the 
right size any longer. You 
can	have	a	new	one	fitted	at	
your family planning clinic 
(FPC), see sexualhealthni.
